name: OASIS (itch) (VR_Tex)
description:
Enjoy your relaxing life as a farmer! 
Plant fruits, decorate the place, help out the locals and see where the day takes you.

Current features:

  • Farming System
  • Inventory System
  • Decorating Features
  • Dialogue Trees with Choices
  • Shop-System
  • Extras (like Concept Art)
  • Functional Options Menu with Settings
  • Authentic PS1 Style Graphics
  • Secrets


Software Details
This game was made in context of the SuSe20 - Frieden Game Jam and is continued to be developed after the submission. 

This is a one-man project so far, with some external help for 2D Icons and debugging.
